Take time to browse eye catching silk fabrics, beautiful cottons, designer fabrics, Bangalore silk, buttons and tassels and much more![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-service-section”][vc_column_inner el_class=”home-services” width=”1/3″][mk_image src=”https://tailorjunction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/gents-suit-length.jpeg” image_size=”full” link=”https://tailorjunction.com/fabric/gents-suit-length/” align=”center” margin_bottom=”30″][vc_column_text align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1605507812311{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]
